course.subject: MATH
course.name: Independent Study: Advanced Topics in Financial Economics
course.description: This is an independent study course. Students will be asked to work on a project on some topics in financial/actuarial mathematics. Topics includes (1) the application of statistics in portfolio management/risk management or (2) numerical algorithm for pricing complex financial derivatives. Students should seek the course instructor's approval to take this course.
course.prerequisites: MATH 2411 AND (MATH 4512 OR MATH 4514)
